entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain showers or drizzle beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
